description: This file defines an interface (ILocalStore) for local storage operations, including methods for opening storage, creating tables, managing entry limits, retrieving entries, and removing entries. It also defines a shared pointer type alias for the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface for local storage operations with methods for managing tables and entries in a key-value store-like structure.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local store at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the local store.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a specified range in a table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from a table starting from a position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
